transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Dheeraj sir good morning main Sakshi baat kar rahi thi account manager aapki actually aap Saturday ko call kar rahe the sir customer care pe aapko koi concern tha.
Customer: Haan ho gaya solve ho gaya wo solve ho gaya baat ho gaya tha.
Executive: Abhi login ho gaya sir wo aapki na buylead balance I guess khatam ho gayi thi is wajah se wo login.
Customer: Haan haan haan khatam ho gaya tha.
Executive: Okay to abhi sab okay hai na sir.
Customer: Haan abhi sab okay hai.
Executive: Okay sir ye mujhe ek cheez bata dijiye GI wire mesh aapki aap deal karte ho na isme actually ye product add nahi hai aapke catalog mein add karu na.
Customer: Haan haan add kar dena.
Executive: Add add kar dena na.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aur ek hexagonal wire mesh ye bhi add kar du.
Customer: Haan haan haan kar dijiye.
Executive: Next hai aapka ek aur hai sir retaining walls.
Customer: Retaining wall bhi kar dijiye.
Executive: Okay theek hai main teeno aapke catalog mein add kar deti hu okay sir isko isko ensure kariye na thoda sa front mein aaye thoda sa aur kuch update kariye na isko aur thoda sa.
Executive: Jaise ki sir jaise aap bataye.
Customer: Lead late aati hai thoda sa lead matlab late aati hai.
Executive: Late aati hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Okay theek hai pehle main ye add kar deti hu sir uske baad main aapse puchti hu ki aur kya kya isme add karne ka hai theek hai.
Customer: Nahi aur kuch add nahi karna hai aur kuch add nahi karna hai bas yahi rahega.
Executive: Achcha okay sir okay.
Customer: Isko aap bas ye dekhiye isko update kariye na aur kaise update hoga ye hai na.
Executive: Late aati hai matlab main samjhi nahi jaise man lo do minute pehle haan.
Customer: Matlab jaise hota hai ki kai baar kya hota hai hum lead purchase karne aate hai wo expire ho jati hai.
Executive: Achcha okay jab aap click karte ho to waha pe likh ke aata hai ki aapki buylead consumption ho gayi already actually wo is wajah se bhi hota hai sir ki aapko bhi pata hai ki aapki jo product line hai wo thoda sa unique aur demanded bhi hai to sometimes aisa hota hai ki aapke jo competitors hai wo agar aapke pehle buylead consumption kar lete hai sir to us case mein aisa hota hai aur ek lead ko sirf chaar log consumption kar sakte hai to agar aap usko consume karne jaoge to ye problem aati hogi aapke paas.
Executive: Jaise aapke sirf do hi yaha pe main products dikh rahe hai main matlab sabse zyada consumption aapki gabion box ki hui hai sir ye GI wire mesh ki to aap zyada karte nahi ho.
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: So is is not your main product GI wire mesh.
Customer: Nahi ye bhi ye bhi wo actually naam hai uske bas alag alag naam hai cheez ek hi hai wo.
Executive: Achcha okay matlab category sab same hi hai wire netting bhi same hai GI wire mesh bhi gabion.
Customer: Retension retension wall bhi gabion box bhi hexagonal sab ek hi cheez hai.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Jaise ek kisi vyakti ka naam hota hai chinku minku dinku pinku ghar ka naam bahar ka naam.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Okay matlab product ek hi hai bas uski category alag alag hai.
Customer: Jagah jagah ka naam state wise state wise naam rakh diya hai uska sab kuch.
Executive: Achcha yahi reason hai ki aap aapne GI wire mesh ki bhi lead bahut zyada consumption kari hai halaki ye bhi aapke catalog mein added nahi hai but aapne usko consume kiya hai hexagonal wire mesh ka bhi kara hai ye bhi added nahi hai to ye main last time bhi aapse pucha tha but aapne aap se baat ho nahi payi thi sir is wajah se maine add nahi kiya tha.
Customer: Add kar do add kar do.
Executive: Retaining walls bhi add kar du na pakka ye bhi hai na.
Customer: Haan haan haan ye bhi kar dijiye pura maya ek hi hai ye hai na.
Executive: Okay aur prices wagera sab as it is hi rakhna hai jo.
Customer: Haan as it is rakho usme koi fark nahi padta.
Executive: Achcha okay aur sir ek aur cheez ye aap mujhe iski kuch new images aapke paas padi hai kya jaise man lo bahut time ka matlab aap to already paanch saal se ho hi gaye hamare sath to aapki jo catalog mein images wagera padi hai wo sab pehle ki hi padi hai to koi aisa like images wagera hai jo aap.
Customer: Whatsapp pe hello bhej do aap apna main aapko whatsapp kar dunga hai na.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai sir theek hai profile bhi achcha kar do na thoda sa profile bhi achcha kar do na thoda sa.
Customer: Profile aap mujhe bata de sir jaise main to aapke account manager hu main kai baar try bhi karti hu ki aapse discuss karu sari cheeze but wo aapse connect ho nahi pata hai zyada is wajah se main puch bhi nahi paati hu aapse jaise ki matlab aap mujhe koi hint de ki kis tarike se main update karu.
Customer: Main pehle profile padh lu purana profile padh lu kya fir usme bata dunga aapko.
Executive: Okay aur ek sir ek aapki price kuch incorrect show ho rahi hai aapko shayad ye pata bhi hoga wire mesh gabion mattress.
Customer: Are price price price price se check nahi padta hai apna product price wise kuch nahi hai.
Customer: Price kuch bhi dal do.
Executive: Matlab wo incorrect show hota hai na sir to just buyer bhi agar search karta hai na to wo buyer ko bhi.
Customer: Buyer buyer buyer wo wo buyer price nahi dekhta wo wo sirf product dhundta hai wo.
Executive: Achcha okay to price aapke according main hata du to chalega kyuki wo incorrect waise bhi show ho raha hai.
Customer: Hata do hata do usko price matter nahi karta.
Executive: Okay aur actually jo bhi buyer hai na jo bhi buyer hai na wo sirf company pata karta hai kaun kaun banati hai usko bas.
Executive: Achcha okay matlab unko sirf aapki profile se matlab hota hai ki aap agar ye same cheez banate ho to wo aapko contact karte hai.
Customer: Contact karte hai baki price wo online nahi purchase karte kuch bhi product.
Executive: Achcha okay koi nahi sir main isko na ek bar update kar deti hu price wala to aapne mujhe bata diya to jo jo already pada hai sahi hai usko chhod deti hu aur jo incorrect show ho raha hai usko main remove kar deti hu aapke kehne pe theek hai aur scores main theek hai kar deti hu main hi karke message kare aap kuch images mere ko share kar do taki main usko add kar du sir.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Okay thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's buylead balance was exhausted.

- Customer states leads are coming late.

- Customer's catalog needs product updates.

- Incorrect price is showing on the catalog.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed login issue is resolved.

- Executive added GI wire mesh, hexagonal wire mesh, retaining walls.

- Executive will remove incorrect price from catalog.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will share new images on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, product update, price
